product_name: Granite Gear Traditional Canoe Portage Pack #4
long_description: This pack refines the age-old portage pack design with an anatomically cut harness system, sternum strap, arched lid and drawcord overflow. Updated design is now built with Cordura(R) nylon--it's every bit as strong as former material but much lighter. Padded hip belt adds comfort and stability over long portages. Side compression straps allow you to stabilize the load and lash on extra gear. Ballistic nylon bottom offers excellent durability, no matter where you set pack.
short_description: This pack refines the age-old portage pack design with an anatomically cut harness system, sternum strap, arched lid and drawcord overflow.
